faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about buying property in Georgia
faq.q1: Is it possible to buy an apartment remotely?
faq.a1: Yes! You can purchase property in Georgia completely remotely without visiting the country. We provide comprehensive online services to make the process seamless.
faq.q1d1: Virtual property tours with 360° views and live video calls
faq.q1d2: Digital document signing with full legal validity
faq.q1d5: Power of attorney can be arranged if needed
faq.q1d6: Our team handles all on-ground procedures for you
faq.q2: What are the ways to pay for real estate in Georgia?
faq.a2: Georgia offers flexible payment options including cash, bank transfers, cryptocurrency, installments, and mortgages to accommodate international investors.
faq.q2d1: Cash payment in USD, EUR, or GEL
faq.q2d5: Bank mortgages with competitive rates (8-12% annually)
faq.q3: How to choose the right property in Georgia?
faq.a3: Our expert team analyzes your goals, budget, and preferences across 6 key parameters to find properties that perfectly match your investment objectives.
faq.q3d1: Define your purpose: investment, residence, or relocation
faq.q3d2: Determine budget: new builds from $800/m², resale from $1,200/m²
faq.q3d3: Choose location: Tbilisi (capital), Batumi (seaside), or mountain areas
faq.q3d5: Evaluate developer reputation and construction quality
faq.q3d6: Check nearby infrastructure and future development plans
faq.q3d7: Review legal status and ownership documents
faq.q3d8: We provide detailed analysis reports for each option
faq.q4: Can I get Georgian citizenship after buying real estate?
faq.a4: Real estate purchase alone does not grant citizenship, but it can help you obtain a residence permit which is the first step toward citizenship.
faq.q4d1: Residence permit available for property owners (annual renewal)
faq.q4d2: Investment of $100,000+ in property qualifies for residence
faq.q4d3: After 5 years of legal residence, you can apply for citizenship
faq.q4d4: Dual citizenship is allowed in Georgia
faq.q4d5: Citizenship requires language test and integration exam
faq.q4d6: Real estate ownership is a strong supporting factor
faq.q4d7: We assist with all residence permit applications
faq.q5: What are the real estate taxes in Georgia?
faq.a5: Georgia has one of the most favorable tax systems in the world for property owners, with very low annual taxes and no capital gains tax.
faq.q5d1: Annual property tax: 0.05% - 1% of cadastral value (extremely low)
faq.q5d2: No capital gains tax when selling property
faq.q5d3: No wealth tax or inheritance tax
faq.q5d4: Rental income tax: 5% flat rate (one of the lowest globally)
faq.q5d7: Foreign and local owners pay the same rates
faq.q6: How do I get a loan or mortgage in Georgia?
faq.a6: Both local and international buyers can access mortgages from Georgian banks, with competitive rates and flexible terms available.
faq.q6d1: Mortgage available for foreigners and residents
faq.q6d2: Interest rates: 8-12% annually (depends on bank and profile)
faq.q6d3: Down payment: typically 20-30% of property value
faq.q6d5: Required documents: passport, income proof, employment verification
faq.q6d6: Some banks offer pre-approval within 3-5 days
faq.q6d7: We partner with major banks to facilitate your application
faq.q6d8: Alternative: 0% developer installment plans (no bank needed)
faq.q7: How long does the property purchase process take?
faq.a7: The entire process can be completed in as little as 1-5 days if all documents are ready, making Georgia one of the fastest markets globally.
faq.q7d1: Property selection: 1-3 days with our expert team
faq.q7d6: Can be done remotely without visiting Georgia
faq.q7d7: We expedite all processes for our clients
faq.q8: What ROI can I expect from rental properties?
faq.a8: Georgia offers exceptional rental yields, especially in Tbilisi and Batumi, with annual returns ranging from 10% to 30% depending on property type and location.
faq.q8d3: Tbilisi city center: highest demand for long-term
faq.q8d4: Batumi seaside: excellent for vacation rentals
faq.q8d5: New developments: typically higher yields than resale
faq.q8d7: Guaranteed rental programs available for some projects
faq.q8d8: Capital appreciation: 5-15% annually in prime locations
faq.q9: Is it safe to buy property in Georgia as a foreigner?
faq.a9: Georgia has a transparent, secure legal system with full foreign ownership rights and strong property protection laws.
faq.q9d1: Foreigners have 100% ownership rights (same as locals)
faq.q9d2: Property rights protected by law and international treaties
faq.q9d3: Public registry system ensures title transparency
faq.q9d4: Low corruption levels and rule of law
faq.q9d6: Title insurance available for extra protection
faq.q9d7: We conduct full legal due diligence on every property
faq.q9d8: Georgia ranks high in World Bank "Ease of Doing Business"
faq.q10: What about property management and maintenance?
faq.a10: We offer comprehensive property management services to handle everything from tenant search to maintenance, ensuring hassle-free ownership.
faq.q10d7: Management fees: typically 8-10% of rental income
faq.q10d8: 24/7 emergency support for tenants and owners
